body_html:
@d4l3k When did you clone? The -fomit-frame-pointer flag added to tf_copts() in d410a83 should take care of the insufficient register error.

I've just now re-cloned and verified that the command:
bazel build --verbose_failures //tensorflow/contrib/android:libtensorflow_inference.so --crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool --host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain --cpu=armeabi-v7a works on my system using NDK r14b.
